cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's norikomu

sentence.kanji: あの駅で学生がたくさん乗り込んだね。
sentence.romaji: ano eki de gakusei ga takusan norikonda ne
sentence.english: A lot of students got on board at that station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's noriori

sentence.kanji: この駅でたくさんの人が乗り降りしますね。
sentence.romaji: kono eki de takusan no hito ga noriori shimasu ne
sentence.english: A huge number of people get on and off at this station.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jousha

sentence.kanji: このバスの運賃は乗車するときに払います。
sentence.romaji: kono basu no unchin ha jousha suru toki ni haraimasu
sentence.english: On this bus, you pay the fare when you get on.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shunkashuutou

sentence.kanji: 春夏秋冬の移り変わりを見るのが大好きです。
sentence.romaji: shunkashuutou no utsurikawari wo miru no ga daisuki desu
sentence.english: I love to see the seasons changing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seinen

sentence.kanji: 町の青年たちはボランティア活動をしています。
sentence.romaji: machi no seinentachi ha boranteia katsudou wo shite imasu
sentence.english: Young people in the town are doing volunteer work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's risei

sentence.kanji: 人間は理性を持つ動物です。
sentence.romaji: ningen ha risei wo motsu doubutsu desu
sentence.english: Human beings are rational animals.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seiri

sentence.kanji: 昨日、生理が始まったの。
sentence.romaji: kinou seiri ga hajimata no
sentence.english: My period started yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jishuu

sentence.kanji: 今日は料理の実習があった。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha ryouri no jishuu ga ata
sentence.english: Today we had cooking practice.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sei

sentence.kanji: 私がこの世に生を受けて80年が過ぎたわ。
sentence.romaji: watashi ga konoyo ni sei wo ukete hachijuunen ga sugita wa
sentence.english: More than 80 years have passed since I came into this world.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iiarawasu

sentence.kanji: この気持ちをうまく言い表わせません。
sentence.romaji: kono kimochi wo umaku iiarawasemasen
sentence.english: I can't express this feeling well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's warini

sentence.kanji: この映画は割に面白いわ。
sentence.romaji: kono eiga ha warini omoshiroi wa
sentence.english: This movie is rather interesting.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinjitsu

sentence.kanji: 真実は一つです。
sentence.romaji: shinjitsu ha hitotsu desu
sentence.english: There is one truth.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's doujou

sentence.kanji: 友人は私に同情してくれたよ。
sentence.romaji: yuujin ha watashi ni doujou shite kureta yo
sentence.english: My friend sympathized with me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ikiikito

sentence.kanji: 子供たちが生き生きと遊んでいるね。
sentence.romaji: kodomotachi ga ikiikito asonde iru ne
sentence.english: The kids are playing vigorously.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jounetsu

sentence.kanji: 父は情熱を持って仕事に打ち込んでいます。
sentence.romaji: chichi ha jounetsu wo mote shigoto ni uchikonde imasu
sentence.english: My father is devoting himself to work with zeal.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's umare

sentence.kanji: 彼女は京都の生まれです。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kyouto no umare desu
sentence.english: She was born in Kyoto.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kosei

sentence.kanji: 彼女たちはそれぞれ個性が強いですね。
sentence.romaji: kanojotachi ha sorezore kosei ga tsuyoi desu ne
sentence.english: Each of those women has a strong personality.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's umidasu

sentence.kanji: 彼は数々の名作を生み出した。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kazukazu no meisaku wo umidashita
sentence.english: He produced a number of masterpieces.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shusan

sentence.kanji: 彼女は女の子を出産したんだ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha onna no ko wo shusan shita n da
sentence.english: She gave birth to a girl.

cards.english: take advantage of, make use of
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ikasu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は語学力を仕事に生かしているね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha gogakuryoku wo shigoto ni ikashite iru ne
sentence.english: She takes advantage of her language ability in her work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ikebana

sentence.kanji: 彼女は生け花の先生です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha ikebana no sensei desu
sentence.english: She is a flower arrangement teacher.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hayasu

sentence.kanji: 彼はヒゲを生やしています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha hige wo hayashite imasu
sentence.english: He's growing a beard.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's wari

sentence.kanji: 3日に1度の割りで彼からメールが来るの。
sentence.romaji: mika ni 1 do no wari de kare kara me-ru ga kuru no
sentence.english: I get e-mails from him at a rate of once every three days.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nama

sentence.kanji: 彼は生の魚が食べられません。
sentence.romaji: kare ha nama no sakana ga taberaremasen
sentence.english: He can't eat raw fish.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuujou

sentence.kanji: 彼らは強い友情で結ばれているな。
sentence.romaji: karera ha tsuyoi yuujou de musubarete iru na
sentence.english: They're tied by a strong friendship.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ikikata

sentence.kanji: 自分らしい生き方をしなさい。
sentence.romaji: jibun rashii ikikata wo shinasai
sentence.english: Live life in your own way.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seibetsu

sentence.kanji: 出席者を性別で分けてください。
sentence.romaji: shusekisha wo seibetsu de wakete kudasai
sentence.english: Please divide attendees by gender.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sei

sentence.kanji: この会社では性による差別はありません。
sentence.romaji: kono kaisha de ha sei ni yoru sabetsu ha arimasen
sentence.english: There is no gender discrimination in this company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jitsuyou

sentence.kanji: これはとても実用的なサイトだね。
sentence.romaji: kore ha totemo jitsuyouteki na saito da ne
sentence.english: This is a very practical site.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jitsuyouteki

sentence.kanji: 彼の発明品はみな実用的だよ。
sentence.romaji: kare no hatsumeihin ha mina jitsuyouteki da yo
sentence.english: All his inventions are practical.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's danseiteki

sentence.kanji: 彼はとても男性的な人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha totemo danseiteki na hito desu
sentence.english: He's a very manly person.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haeru

sentence.kanji: 息子に新しい歯が生えました。
sentence.romaji: musuko ni atarashii ha ga haemashita
sentence.english: My son has a new tooth coming in.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seishi

sentence.kanji: これは人の生死にかかわる問題です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha hito no seishi ni kakawaru mondai de su
sentence.english: This is a matter of life and death.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's miyage

sentence.kanji: 土産に日本酒をもらった。
sentence.romaji: miyage ni nihonshu wo morata
sentence.english: I was given sake as a souvenir.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seizon

sentence.kanji: 乗客は全員生存しています。
sentence.romaji: joukyaku ha zenin seizon shite imasu
sentence.english: All passengers survived.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's joukyaku

sentence.kanji: 乗客の一人の具合が悪くなったの。
sentence.romaji: joukyaku no ichi nin no guai ga waruku nata no 。
sentence.english: The condition of one passenger got worse.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jitsubutsu

sentence.kanji: 何かの説明をする時は実物を使うとわかりやすいの。
sentence.romaji: nanika no setsumei wo suru toki ha jitsubutsu wo tsukau to wakari yasui no
sentence.english: When you explain something, it's easier to understand if you use the real thing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's noridasu

sentence.kanji: 船が長い航海に乗り出したの。
sentence.romaji: fune ga nagai koukai ni noridashita no
sentence.english: The ship set out on a long sea voyage.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ishou

sentence.kanji: 一生のお願いがあります。
sentence.romaji: ishou no onegai ga arimasu
sentence.english: I have a once-in-a-lifetime favor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's dousei

sentence.kanji: 同性の友達より異性の友達のほうが多いよ。
sentence.romaji: dousei no tomodachi yori isei no tomodachi no hou ga ooi yo
sentence.english: I have more friends of the opposite sex than I do of the same sex.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seinengapi

sentence.kanji: ここに生年月日を記入してください。
sentence.romaji: koko ni seinengapi wo kinyuu shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please fill in your date of birth here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aojiroi

sentence.kanji: 彼女は青白い顔をしているね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha aojiroi kao wo shite iru ne
sentence.english: Her face is pale.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seimei

sentence.kanji: 生命は海から始まったと言われている。
sentence.romaji: seimei ha umi kara hajimata to iwarete iru
sentence.english: It is said that life started in the sea.

cards.english: to go to work, attendance at work
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shukin

sentence.kanji: 毎朝7時5分に出勤します。
sentence.romaji: maiasa shichi ji go fun ni shukin shimasu
sentence.english: I go to work at 7:05 every morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsutomesaki

sentence.kanji: 私の勤め先にご連絡ください。
sentence.romaji: watashi no tsutomesaki ni gorenraku kudasai
sentence.english: Please contact my office.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsutome

sentence.kanji: 来月で勤めをやめます。
sentence.romaji: raigetsu de tsutome wo yamemasu
sentence.english: I'll quit my job next month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinmu

sentence.kanji: 私の一日の勤務時間は8時間です。
sentence.romaji: watashi no ichinichi no kinmujikan ha hachijikan desu
sentence.english: I work 8 hours a day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jiseki

sentence.kanji: 彼は営業で実績を上げたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha eigyou de jiseki wo ageta n da
sentence.english: He achieved good results working in sales.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanjou

sentence.kanji: 感情とは複雑なものです。
sentence.romaji: kanjou to ha fukuzatsu na mono desu
sentence.english: Emotions are complex things.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jikan

sentence.kanji: 子供が歩き始めたとき、子供の成長を実感した。
sentence.romaji: kodomo ga arukihajimeta toki kodomo no seichou wo jikan shita
sentence.english: I got a real sense of my kid's growth when he started walking.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sainan

sentence.kanji: 旅先で思いがけない災難にあいました。
sentence.romaji: tabisaki de omoigakenai sainan ni aimashita
sentence.english: We encountered an unexpected misfortune on the trip.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suigai

sentence.kanji: 水害でたくさんの人が家を失ったの。
sentence.romaji: suigai de takusan no hito ga ie wo ushinata no
sentence.english: A great number of people lost their homes due to flood damage.
